title: Resting 500 ms latency randomly smooth game play
body: I have a mojor problem randomly when playing games my latency will sky rocket resting at 500-550 making me leave the game since it is unplayable. i live 20min from the chicago server there is no reason why i should have the latency of connecting to brazil. I love league but it is the one game that can make me more mad than any other when its unplayable. anything i can do that will help me fix this problem i have updated all my drivers  im connected to my router with a cat 6 cable all my setting are min and i cap my fr at 60.

replies.body:
Latency rises such as this are often the result of poor network routing to the server. We can take a look at your route, but we first need to ensure your local settings are all good. To do this, I suggest working through the steps outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
